title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view in the Java perspective is lost.
OB: Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. Double click the title bar to maximize it. Switch to the resource perspective. Come back to the Java perspective.
SR: To maintain the maximized state of the view when switching perspectives, the CVS repository view in the Java perspective should retain its maximized state after switching perspectives and returning to the Java perspective.
